          <title>
            <string language="en">Living things and waste excretion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lebende Sachen und überschüssige Ausscheidung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Choses vivantes et excrétion de rebut</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Coisas vivas e excretion waste</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cose viventi ed escrezione residua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πράγματα διαβίωσης και έκκριση αποβλήτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cosas vivas y excreción inútil</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the need of humans and animals as living things to get rid of waste. In this case carbon dioxide is exhaled.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Breathing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Carbon dioxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">excretion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">exhaling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">life processes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">living things</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Respiration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wastes</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Notwendigkeit der 
Menschen und der Tiere, während die lebenden Sachen zum loszuwerden 
Vergeudung. In diesem Fall wird Kohlendioxyd ausgeatmet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le besoin des humains 
et des animaux pendant que les choses vivantes à se débarasser de la
perte. Dans ce cas-ci l'anhydride carbonique est exhalé.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a necessidade dos seres 
humanos e dos animais enquanto as coisas vivas a começar livram do 
desperdício. Neste caso o dióxido de carbono exhaled.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il bisogno degli 
esseri umani e degli animali mentre le cose viventi da eliminare 
spreco. In questo caso l'anidride carbonica è esalata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την ανάγκη των ανθρώπων 
και των ζώων ως πράγματα διαβίωσης για να ξεφορτωθεί τα απόβλητα.
Σε αυτήν την περίπτωση το διοξείδιο του άνθρακα αναδίνεται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la necesidad de seres 
humanos y de animales mientras que las cosas vivas a conseguir libran 
de basura. En este caso se exhala el bióxido de carbono.</string>
          </description>
